title: "Challenges" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the 'Challenges' screen
custom_steps: WHEN an AdMarvel ad is added and targeted to this page
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the positioned directly above the tab bar for the Head & Shoulders branding
AND the ad should direct to https://www.facebook.com/#!/HeadandShouldersForMen?fref=ts
